title: Learning Journal Competency Enhancement Program Using Gradual Fading-Out Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language expression skills and self-reflection abilities
context.additional_context: Interactive journaling environment using digital tools, providing personalized feedback based on learners' professional proficiency levels

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can maintain a weekly self-directed learning journal and apply cognitive strategies (concept linking, critical analysis) over 80% of the time.
Learners can enhance goal-setting ability by 30% through metacognitive reflection (evaluating learning processes, modifying strategies).
External prompt dependency can be reduced from 50% to 20% or less according to gradual phase-out stages.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
